panel.html: Betterpdf integration Allows to place a link in a dashboard that generates the data as .pdf file and provides a variety of formating settings that include a chart of your data according to your wishes. Here is an example what it could look like : pie demo Short video demo > And the snippet of code in the simple xml dashboard to do this looks like this: pie demo As you can see the link contains parameters that are combined with the default settings resulting in a spreadsheet with a pie chart and a custom title. Under examples you can find some common ways to embed and use this. Also included is a sample dashboard showing export of the search results in a dashboard.
